apis.name: Error Tracking project settings
apis.description: The project settings API allows you to retrieve the Error Tracking settings for a project. Only for users with Maintainer role for the project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Enable or disable the Error Tracking project settings
apis.description: The API allows you to enable or disable the Error Tracking settings for a project. Only for users with the Maintainer role for the project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Pass true to enable the already configured error tracking settings or false to disable it.

attributes.name: integrated
attributes.description: Pass true to enable the integrated error tracking backend. Available in GitLab 14.2 and later.

apis.name: Error Tracking client keys
apis.description: For integrated error tracking feature. Only for users with the Maintainer role for the project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

apis.name: Create a client key
apis.description: Creates a new client key for a project. The public key attribute is generated automatically.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

apis.name: Delete a client key
apis.description: Removes a client key from the project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: key_id
attributes.description: The ID of the client key.
